column1: Was #Covid19 sent to save #Assange from an illegal & criminal extradition? Probably not. However the timing is interesting, as the #UK (& the #US) govt will now have plenty on their plate amid their mismanagement of the outbreak, & they may want to avoid pissing ppl off further.
Could Coronavirus Trigger the Monetary Reset? @Mike_Maloney &amp
